summary: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Michael Sarrazin|Montel Williams|Roy Scheider|Christopher Heyerdahl|Allen Altman|Martin Neufeld|Monika Schnarre|Tim Post|Carl Alacchi|Chip Chuipka|Roc LaFortune|Goûchy Boy|Phil Chiu|Serge Houde|David Francis|Larry Day|Alan Fawcett|Philip Pretten|Andy Bradshaw|Dave Nichols|Frank Fontaine|Vlasta Vrana|Michael Caloz|Michel Perron|David Siscoe|Mark Camacho|Susan Glover|Rod Charlebois|Al Dubois|John Sanford Moore|Gwen Tolbart|Eramelinda Boquer|D'Arcy Kieran Butler|John Dunn-Hill|Nathalie Sanschagrin|Barry Bellamy|Jeff Bottoms|Michael Cullin|Michael Jaye|Alan Nebelthau|Mike Azevedo|Kevin Coyle
title: Peacekeeper: Chantaje nuclear
